TEXT.S:
ChadChadi Africa a kanatal, u bunak amin i labu nu kanatal, sakamu sa ku taw" mapatayay a balucu' i Africa". inayi' ku bayu' i kanatal. caledes ku demiad hamin a mihca.
u siwkay nu kanatal u Chad sa i labu nu Africa, itiza i 15 00 N, 19 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 1.284 million km2u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 1,259,200 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 24,800 km2hamin nu tademaw sa 11,852,462. kakalukan umah sa 39.60%, kilakilangan umah sa 9.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 51.30%. Chad masakaputay a kanatal, ngangan u Chadhan, (u imi aca, A-la-buo a kamu, ‎ Tšād; Fa-kou a kamu, Tchad /'tʃæd/) nu Fay-cou tepanay lalabuay nu kanatal, nuamisan mitules tu Li-pi-ya nuwalian mitules tu Su-tan atu nu timulan nu Central african republic, satipan nutimulan nababiyaw tu Ce-may-lung, Nay-ci-li-ya, satipan atu Ni-zea kanatal u kalikeluhan, malikeluh. uyni u Chada kakitizaan u tepan nu Fey-zou, mabatad ku bayu, paymihcaan caledes ku demiad, satu u lala' nu kanatal kakitizaan u likelikenan namin, sisa pangangan han tu "mapatayay a balucu' nu Fey-zou han". (u kamu nu Hulam sa::‎ Tšād; :Tchad i/'tʃæd/"")
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u N'Djamena.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 11 bulad 8 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Mahamat Déby, micakat a demiad sa i 1990 a mihca 12 bulad 2 demiad. u cunli nu Chad ayza sa ci Albert Pahimi Padacké, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bulad 26 demiad.
u hata u kulit nu hata nu Chad sa, izaw ku tulu a kulit, u cunusay a semilaway, u cunusay a takuliway atu sumanahay.
u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: u sulit nu Lipun: u sulit nu Amilika: Chad
laylayayaw nu celahtu 7,000 a mihcaan, Chadnuwamisan a kakitizaan mulangaway mauzipay i hekal, mapadang ku nuenengay nu tademaw , satusa uynian ka kamihcaan i tiniay a kakitizaan saicelang malahat ku tademaw,Chaduyzaan kahenulan maazih ku kasumamadan nisubelidan, a tuud, angangan tuni i Bo-el-ku-en-ney-di-ti-be-se a kakitizaan) taneng talaayaw nu katukuh ayaw nu celah tu ayaw nu 2000 a mihcaan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 7000--2000) namakay yayaw nu celahtu 7000 a mihcaan malingatu izaw tu sabelensa ku tademaw i Chadan saupu sa nueneng, katukuh kakilul tu 9 a kasumamadan a mihcaan, kakilulkilultu sakuwan i Chadnu Sa-ha-la a kakitizaan pakakat atu malawpes, uheni amin naemecmilakuwit tunian a kakitizaan miawas tu Sa-ha-la a zazan nu sapaliwan tu tuud. Chadi 1920 a mihcan maala nu Fa-kuo, mala u Fa-kuo tungusay telecilalnu Fay-couan, 1960 a mihcaan, Chadi Fu-lang-suo-wa-tuo-mu-pa-pa-ye anikelidan makay Fa-kuo a misateked, nika Tuo-mu-ba-ba-ye a lalekuanmalilid ku nuwamisanay a Mu-si-lin a kakitizaan caay katanengen, sazikuzay i 1965 a mihcaan sasacacay sa amabuwah tu katanaya nu ngangayaw nu lalabuay,1979 a mihcaan, mibelihay a cenbu tu hitay ami tebung tu En-cian-na, mapahezektu nutimulan tunisakaku pikuwan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 7000919201960·19651979) nika upabelihaytu cenbu u hitay mikeliday sakakaay a hitayan macaculi ku lalabuay, sazikuzayci Hay-san-ha-pu-lel pakademectu nika ngangayawan tahkal satu mala cung-tun,nika i1990 a mihcaan mapabelin nica ku sakakaay a hitay ci Yy-de-li-se-de-pi, 2003 a mihcaan malingatu, Su-tam satipan macacukahi a ci Ta-bu, satuChada lilis a kanatal caay katanektekku kawaw nu kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ·1990·2003)
cen-ceu hulic pabeli ci Chadtu cacay a sakuwan tu tabakiay nu a kawaw, cung-tung ci Chadu satalakaway nu mukeliday nu kanatal,situngus mikawaw tu cung-tung atu tabang a tademaw sakaput a tademaw nu mikawaway nu cence, pakay pahulicaymiliclicay, u talakaway a hitay, kakatizaan a mikuwanay a tademaw atu kanatalay a u pabay nu pakusiaymikawaw tabaki ku ku kalilid. yu tabaki ku kakenuhan a kawaw, cung-tung i ku-min-i-huay amatatengilhawsa taneng amipasakamu tu mahiniay u kacenuhan sasakalahay a tukiana kawaw, Cung-tung u binawlan ku misingkiway lima a mihcacan mala cung-tung, 2005 a mihcaan Chadmaawas ku baluhay a nupahulican, papiales tu nu cung-tung tulaskala cung-tungan. i ayaw cung-tung cinacacay dada' batilinkinacacay mala cung-tung, ci Te-bi a cung-tung u angangan u pipalitaan uyzaamin Za-cia-wa a tademaw ,uyzaamin makaiay a sakaput atu timulay paybinacadan i cenbu izawamini cenbu daysiw, u maanubay i Chada kanatal atumahiniay, mahapingan ku kitakit i 2005 a mihcaan patahkal tu tamelacay a nisulitan mucel kubalucu' nisulitanpaazih Chada kanatal i kitakit amin u maanubay a pihacengay a kanatal,, 2006 a mihcaan kahiniadidi kunikasumat. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ;200520052006) Chada hulic patizeng i Fa-kou a tademawan a hulic min-fa atu Chadtunu kasumamadan a hulic, zikuzan satu cayay tu kapipikuwan tu kapulungan a tunipisilutatu hulic paleca tu pidiput, kanahatuu hulic paaning tu Chadmisadekedaya kawaw tunu huingay a hulic, nika hamin u kahenulan nu huing a hulic tademaw nu u cung-tung amin kusitungusay satalakaway a huing atu u cung-tung mikawaway. talakaway a huing atu pahulicay a wiy-yun-huay u Chadu satalakaway pasakaput nu huing a hulic, satalakaway a huing cacay a tademawan makay u sakakaay nu huing sakakaay nu huing atu nu zumaay a sakapuaa sabw lima ku tademaw, pakay sakaput a tademaw makay i Tung-tung atu kou-min huy-i ku situngusay, tahadikud ku kal Cung-tung a lekec. pahulicay a wiyen huy siwaay a tademaw ka pulung tu miliclicay, sawa ku kala Tung-tung, wiye huy izaw situngus tu hulic, katatelekan atu kitakit tu ni kakaletekan mikawaw taayaw a mikinsa tu sakuwanan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1599)
cence keni a kakitizaanChadmaha u kananatal a nikenisan lasic tu 22 a kakitizaan, uynian a zazan i 2003 a mihcaan a kakitizaan a kasilacan a mikawaw, mikutay tu nuyanay tu a kenis tu sabaw sepat, paykakitizaan izaw amin ku cacay Tung-tung ku mikayawaw tu sakakaay nu mikelitay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 22200314)
hekal a lala'Chadmalatulu ku mahapinganhekal lala' a kakitizaan, nuwamisan u Sa-ha-la-sa-mu a kakitizaan. tepanay a kakitizaan atu nuwamisan Su-tan nalinabuana kakitizaan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :) Chadmalalasidtu tuluay angangan nu hekal a lala' kenis, nuwamisan nu likelikenan a kakitizaan nu tunusay u caledesay likelikenan a demiad, tepanay makedalku Sa-he-el a kakitizaan, tungusay caledesay nu nalinabuwan a demiad atu nutimulan u sidemekaynu Su-dan a nalinabuwan nalinabuwan a kakitizaan, tungusay a caledesay kilangkilangan a demiad, uynian a kanatal u Chada taku a nupangangan kanatalay sakatalakaway a buyu' tini i Sa-ha-la a Cu-si a buyu', kahenulan a tuse atu satabakiay a tuse u En-cang-na. Chada kanatal pulung malakuwi tu 200 nu binacadan, Fa-kuo a kamu atu A-la-po a kamu u kanatalay a kamu, Yi-se-lan-ciaw u sayadahay a singkunu tademaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: :;;200)
lalangawanChadyadah u masazumaay a binacadan a kamu, yadah ku kasumamadan nisubelid a lalangawan. Chadcenbu sapilisak patiyak tu cenbu sakalah micucuhtu kunuan kasumamadan atu lalangawan nu kanatal, patahekal tu nu Chada kanatal piazihan tu tuud nu kasumamadanatu Chadpasaupuan tu lalangawan.[1] (u kamu nu Hulam sa: )
